## LoggerService.debug() method

Logs an event with the LogEventLevel.debug severity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
debug(messageTemplate: string, ...properties: any[]): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  messageTemplate | <code>string</code> | Message template for the log event. |
|  properties | <code>any[]</code> | Properties that can be used to render the message template. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`any`
